channel.title: technology on Azure Coding Architect
channel.description: Recent content in technology on Azure Coding Architect

item.title: Practice what you preach!
item.description: When I decided to start blogging again, I knew I wanted to talk about the things I face, working with Azure. In the past I used to blog as well, back then I blogged on my Journey into CRM which I started in 2014. In 2014 the state of technology was much different; one would use WordPress (or similar). The main choice was host it yourself or host it at a hosting provider.
